text: "Armageddon It" is a 1988 song by English heavy metal band Def Leppard and is the fifth single from their fourth studio album Hysteria. It went to number 20 in the United Kingdom, number 3 in the United States, number 34 in Australia, number 2 in New Zealand, number 11 in Ireland and number 8 in Canada. ==Track listings== CD: Bludgeon Riffola / LEPCD4 (UK) / 870 239-2 (INT) # "Armageddon It" # "Ring of Fire" # "Animal" # "Pour Some Sugar on Me" 7-inch: Bludgeon Riffola / Vertigo / 872 692-7P (CANADA) / picture disc # "Armageddon It" # "Release Me" 7-inch: Bludgeon Riffola / Polygram / Mercury / 872 692-7 (INT) # "Armageddon It" # "Release Me" ==References== Category:1988 songs Category:Def Leppard songs Category:Hard rock songs
title: Armageddon It
